https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eTi13Vuqqfc135tUkc7BBDjotq5.jpg Two single parents stumble into the possibility of love for Christmas, only to discover that their daughters are embroiled in a nasty rivalry at school. When the rivalry gets out of control, can hope and healing lead everyone to a peaceful and merry Christmas? Christmas Solo
